tossup_question: 13) PHYSICS  The existence of the nucleus was shown by the bombardment of gold atoms with what particles?
bonus_question: 13) PHYSICS  Consider a circuit with resistors of equal resistance in parallel. What is the effect on the total resistance of the circuit if another equivalent resistor is added?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Increase
X) Decrease
Y) No change
Z) Depends on the resistance
